description: The Men’s Summit Series Verbier GTX Bibs have the performance-built design needed for big mountain days. Made from 100% recycled, waterproof GORE-TEX 3L fabric, these bibs have an articulated fit, single-pull adjustable suspenders and a temperature-regulating Chimney Venting™ system.
name: The North Face Summit Verbier GTX Bib, Long - Mens
